New Records: Bo Naylor tied for 11th home run of the season
Emmanuel Clase tied Cody Allen with 149 career saves on Cleveland's all-time list
Emmanuel Clase has converted a career-high 26 straight save opportunities since May 20
Key Match Events: Bo Naylor sparked a rally in the seventh inning with his 11th home run
Cleveland took the lead with three more runs thanks to a variety of bloop hits and slap singles
Emmanuel Clase mowed through the top of the Royals lineup for his 39th save
Pre-Game Insights: Manager Stephen Vogt emphasized the importance of two-out hitting
The Guardians were looking to avoid a four-game sweep
Post-Match Reflections: Manager Stephen Vogt praised the team's comeback win and two-out hitting
Bo Naylor and Will Brennan have been contributing to the team's success
Miscellaneous Highlights: Cleveland's six hits in the seventh inning marked a season high for a single inning
The Guardians moved one game ahead of Kansas City for sole possession of first place in the division
